\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 47100}

\subsection*{Change Up}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{a little bored}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Cannabis & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Poppies - California & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Last night I smoked a bowl of weed and california poppy and it was pretty good. The poppy smoke was a little harsh but not too bad. It produced an extra chill and relaxed feeling that affected my body a bit more than just weed. As it wore off I got pretty tired, more so than normal. There was a definate difference in the high. I think I will try it again to get a better sense of any legitimate effects.

\end{document}
